price: Na Yɛamma Asomafoͻ no honam a enni aduane, na Yɛannyε wͻn (nnipa a) wͻbεtena (wiase) afe bͻͻ (na wͻn nwuo).
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnāhum jasadan lā yakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wamā kānū khālidīna
